findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export X_API_KEY="your-api-key
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export X_API_SECRET="your-api-secret
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export X_ACCESS_TOKEN="your-access-token
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export X_ACCESS_SECRET="your-access-token-secret
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern
